news_title: Metaplanet Acquires Another 4,279 Bitcoin, Now Holds 35,102 BTC
news_subtitle: Bitcoin News Tokyo-listed investment firm Metaplanet has purchased 4,279 Bitcoin during the fourth quarter for approximately $451 million, advancing its long-term treasury strategy. CEO Simon Gerovich announced Tuesday that total holdings now stand at 35,102 Bitcoin. The company ...

news_title: $11B Bitcoin Whale Opens $748M BTC, ETH and SOL Longs After Ethereum Sale
news_subtitle: Bitcoin News A Bitcoin whale controlling $11 billion in assets has opened three leveraged long positions worth a total of $748 million, betting on price increases for Bitcoin, Ethereum and Solana. The move followed the liquidation of $330 million in Ethereum holdings. The largest...

news_title: Prenetics Abandons Bitcoin Strategy Less Than 3 Months After $48M Raise
news_subtitle: Bitcoin News Prenetics Global has terminated its Bitcoin acquisition plan less than three months after securing $48 million specifically to build a crypto treasury. The health sciences firm announced Tuesday it will redirect full attention toward its IM8 supplements brand instead...

news_title: Bitcoin 2026 Price Predictions: Will BTC See $250K or $10K Next Year?

news_title: Bitcoin ETF Inflows Return With $355M After 7 Days Straight of Outflows
news_subtitle: Bitcoin News U.S. spot Bitcoin exchange-traded funds recorded $355 million in net inflows on Tuesday, reversing a seven-day streak that drained $1.12 billion from the products. BlackRock's iShares Bitcoin Trust led the turnaround with $143.75 million, according to SoSoValue data....
